forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High near 60F. SSW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
